job_tasks.phrase: revolutionize work by automating repetitive tasks with AI-powered digital employees.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the overarching business goal and mission of the company, which is to automate tasks and free up human potential.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure our automation solutions run smoothly, improve over time, and deliver real impact.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the focus on delivering business value and ensuring the solutions meet client needs.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll be the bridge between technology and business
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the role's function in connecting technical aspects with business objectives.
This emphasizes the client-facing aspect and the goal of ensuring clients achieve success with the automation solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with JSON-based configurations, APIs, and automation tools.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates direct interaction with software components and interfaces used in development.

job_tasks.phrase: comfortable navigating technical setups and tweaking Python scripts when needed.
job_tasks.justification: This shows a requirement for understanding and making minor modifications to code, which is part of software development.

While not core model building, modifying scripts implies some level of understanding of the underlying logic and potential adjustments to automation processes, which can be related to model behavior in a broader sense.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure our automation solutions run smoothly, improve over time
job_tasks.justification: This points to the operational aspect of maintaining and enhancing deployed solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Be the first line of technical problem-solving
job_tasks.justification: This signifies a role in diagnosing and resolving issues with operational systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Diagnose root causes of client issues, make necessary adjustments, or coordinate with developers to ensure smooth resolution.
job_tasks.justification: This describes troubleshooting and resolution processes for operational problems.
This indicates a focus on continuous improvement and maintenance of live systems.
This is a key activity in operations to ensure systems are running as expected.
This relates to the ongoing maintenance and improvement of operational systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Help clients maximize the value of their AI-powered digital employees
job_tasks.justification: This is focused on ensuring business outcomes and client satisfaction.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring they continuously improve their processes.
job_tasks.justification: This connects the technical solution back to improving business processes for the client.

soft_skills.phrase: Be the first line of technical problem-solving
Diagnose root causes of client issues
ensuring they continuously improve their processes

classification.rationale: This role heavily emphasizes customer success, troubleshooting, and optimizing existing automation solutions rather than developing new AI models or GenAI applications. While it involves technical aspects like Python and APIs, the core focus is on client management and operational support, not core AI engineering.
